name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Rogue Spear - Black Thorn
name_original: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Rogue Spear - Black Thorn
description:
Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Rogue Spear - Black Thorn is an action, shooter and strategy game developed by Red Storm. It came out on 01-01-2001. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Rogue Spear - Black Thorn is available on PC.
It was scored by Bill Brown.
